div.p: >> Jon: WELCOME BACK.

THE OLYMPIC GAMES -- THE OLYMPIC GAMES IN LONDON HAVE INSPIRED THE WORLD.

>> HAROLD BROOKS OF HEBRON,
MAINE LOVES THE OLYMPICS SEW DECIDED TO HOST AN ATHLETIC CONTEST IN HIS BACKYARD.

DAY STRESMS WE CALLED THE REDNECK OLYMPICS.

PEOPLE MIGHT THINK THE RED NECK OLYMPICS IS SOMEHOW ASSOCIATED WITH THE UNITED STATES OLYMPICS.

I'M GOING GIVE YOU ALL THE POMP AND CIRCUMSTANCE OF AN NBC-STYLE COVERAGE.

MAYBE TEAR UP, SOMETHING.
